content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. So, what price are you thinking of for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think a price of 500 Euros per month would be reasonable.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's quite low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. How about we start at 700 Euros per month? It's a fair offer considering the location and the recent construction. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a big gap. How about we meet in the middle at 600 Euros? I think it's a fair price for both parties.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hmm, let's see. 600 Euros is not bad, but I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the value of this property. How about 650 Euros? It's a little higher, but you'll be getting a great deal for a centrally located, brand-new apartment. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I can agree to the price of 625 Euros per month. I think it's a fair price for both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. It's not enough for the investment I've made in this property. I'm looking for a tenant who can afford to pay at least 650 Euros per month. If you're not willing to pay that much, I'm afraid we won't be able to come to an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price gap is too large and we cannot find a middle ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your position. If you're not willing to meet my asking price, then I'm also not able to reduce it further. It seems we've reached an impasse. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
